## IScopedClusterClient.asCurrentUser property

A [client](./opensearch-dashboards.opensearchclient.md) to be used to query the opensearch cluster on behalf of the user that initiated the request to the OpenSearch Dashboards server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly asCurrentUser: OpenSearchClient;
```
